member.name: IDWriteFont1.GetMetrics
member.summary: Obtains design units and common metrics for the font face. These metrics are applicable to all the glyphs within a font face and are used by applications for layout calculations.
member.param: A filled structure that has font metrics for the current font face. The metrics returned by this method are in font design units.

member.name: IDWriteFont1.GetPanose
member.summary: Gets the PANOSE values from the font and is used for font selection and matching.
member.param: A pointer to the structure to fill in.

member.name: IDWriteFont1.GetUnicodeRanges
member.summary: Retrieves the list of character ranges supported by a font.
member.param: The maximum number of character ranges passed in from the client.
An array of structures that are filled with the character ranges.
A pointer to the actual number of character ranges, regardless of the maximum count.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The buffer is too small. The actualRangeCount was more than the maxRangeCount.

member.name: IDWriteFont1.IsMonospacedFont
member.summary: Determines if the font is monospaced, that is, the characters are the same fixed-pitch width (non-proportional).
member.returns: Returns true if the font is monospaced, else it returns false.

member.name: IDWriteFont1
member.summary: Represents a physical font in a font collection.
